name: Fire Dragon Escape
description:
Fire Dragon Escape is a Classic fast paced shoot em up action game with hours, even days of fun,collecting all achievements will keep you challenged.

Features:

- Unique gameplay. 
-Amazing selectable missions to explore.
- Choice between Accelerometer and Relative touch controls

- Fast-paced action, intense combat that keep you constantly challenged. 

- Dynamic sound effects.  

- Gigantic boss fights and memorable moments with immersive 3D animations.
